title: Ep 150: Don't Text Me Back with Stephanie Wittels Wachs
itunes:title: Ep 150: Don't Text Me Back with Stephanie Wittels Wachs
itunes:subtitle: Content Warning: This episode contains discussions of suicide and opioid addiction starting at 12:15. If you wish to skip this portion of the show, skip ahead to 46:09.Kate finds a candle to rival her favorite scent and Doree mentally prepares for a...
description:
Content Warning: This episode contains discussions of suicide and opioid addiction starting at 12:15. If you wish to skip this portion of the show, skip ahead to 46:09.


Kate finds a candle to rival her favorite scent and Doree mentally prepares for another round of book edits before Stephanie Wittels Wachs (co-founder of Lemonada Media) joins the podcast to give advice on how to care for someone who is experiencing grief, how she began her podcast Last Day and her company Lemonada Media, and what it’s like to discuss taboo subjects on mic.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

 

STORYWORTH - For $20 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.

 

ULTA BEAUTY - See the joy this holiday season! Shop in store, curbside pickup or online at ulta.com.

THIRDLOVE - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.

 

LITERATI - go to literati.com/FOREVER35 for 25% off your first two orders. 

 

HELLOFRESH - Get $20 off your first four boxes when you go to hellofresh.com/forever80 and enter promo code FOREVER80.

 

CALM - For 40% off a Calm Premium subscription, head to calm.com/forever35.

 

GLOSSIER - For a limited time, new customers can get 10% off your first order at Glossier.com/podcast/FOREVER35.





Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
